metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28428 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: PDFio is a C library for reading and writing PDF files. In versions 1.1.0and prior, a denial of service vulnerability exists in the pdfio parser.Crafted pdf files can cause the program to run at 100% utilization andnever terminate. This is different from CVE-2023-24808. A patch for thisissue is available in version 1.1.1.

criterions.comment: ippsample: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
